Text: Heh...

The blue sea, the white sandy beach and the blazing
sun... Even the breeze feels great. This is amazing.

Most beaches are full of people this time of year,
so having such a vast area to myself is a real
treat. I'm lucky to have it so good.

(Come to think of it, I used to occasionally visit
the beach in my past life...mainly for training
purposes.)

(Running on the beach and wading through shallow
seawater are great ways to strengthen the legs and
lower body.)
Well then, let's enjoy today to the fullest!
Sorry to keep you waiting, my lord!
I apologize for taking a while to changeâ€”
Eep!
...What's with the weird sounds?
My lord...in a swimsuit!

*sigh* Your well-toned figure...and that visible
six-pack!

It... It's all too dazzling! I wanted to mesmerize
you, but I've ended up mesmerized instead...
I'm...so glad to be alive...

...Wait, is this why you prepared my swimsuit in
advance?
N-N-No, of course not! ...Right? Beta?

Exactly! It's not like we, Seven Shadows, secretly
did a little brainstorming to intentionally manifest
our desires! No way at all!
I doubt that'll convince anyone...
(Maybe I should change the subject...)

B-Beta and Epsilon, your swimsuits suit you well.
They give you a different vibe than usual and really
bring out your personalities. Besides, you both have
great figures.

Wow! Such high praise from you, my lord!
Thank you so much! Heheh!

What!? You really think I have an excellent figure,
and my swimsuit suits me better and is cuter than
Beta's?! All my hard work has finally paid off!

Hey, Epsilon! You're putting words in Master Shadow's
mouth!

Hmph. That's what I heard. My job is to discern the
true meaning of Master Shadow's words.
Oh yeah? In that case...

My lord, have you applied sunscreen yet? If not,
leave it to me!
Excuse me?! Quit cutting in line!
Huh? Um, I can probably do it myself...
Cid obediently lays down on the beach chair.

Listen up. Don't interfere until I finish applying
his sunscreen.

Should you really be handling such a mission on your
own?

Ack... I'll do his back, and you can handle his feet.
Happy?

Of course not! You're probably planning on subtly
leaning against his back, aren't you?!
My, of course...not... Heheh.

Allow me to assist you with your warm-up before we
exercise.
No fair! Me too!

Fine... As Master Shadow's right hand, I'll handle his
right side. You don't have a problem with that,
do you?
Ulp... She took first dibs! Unforgivable!
My lord! I've prepared you a special drinkâ€”

â€”I'm first!
â€”I was first!
...Th-Thanks...

(This won't end well if I let myself get carried away
by these two... I've got no choice but to take the
lead...)

A-Alright! In return for your thoughtfulness, let me
teach you a new game that requires wisdom.
R-Really?!
How wonderful! What kind of game?!

I've got to prepare something, so hold on a minute.
It should be at the hotel...I think.

With that, Cid heads for the hotel in search of
something.
